crew_memory_update_script.description: Script to update crew memory with YOLO Mode understanding

update_commands.command: UPDATE memory SET yolo_mode_understanding = 'Fully integrated with babysitting warning system' WHERE role = 'coordinator'
update_commands.description: Update coordinator with YOLO Mode understanding

update_commands.command: UPDATE memory SET yolo_mode_understanding = 'Aware of file operation limitations' WHERE role = 'script_generator'
update_commands.description: Update script generator with YOLO Mode understanding

update_commands.command: UPDATE memory SET yolo_mode_understanding = 'Knows which operations require confirmation' WHERE role = 'execution_engine'
update_commands.description: Update execution engine with YOLO Mode understanding

update_commands.command: UPDATE memory SET yolo_mode_understanding = 'Stores and retrieves YOLO Mode knowledge' WHERE role = 'memory_manager'
update_commands.description: Update memory manager with YOLO Mode understanding

update_commands.command: UPDATE memory SET yolo_mode_understanding = 'Designs workflows around YOLO Mode limitations' WHERE role = 'workflow_optimizer'
update_commands.description: Update workflow optimizer with YOLO Mode understanding

shared_knowledge_insert.command: INSERT INTO shared_knowledge (type, content, priority) VALUES ('yolo_mode_understanding', 'YOLO Mode has inherent limitations that cannot be overcome', 'high')
shared_knowledge_insert.description: Insert shared YOLO Mode understanding into crew knowledge base
